short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate A/B test conversion rate and significance

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Designed specifically for Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) professionals and A/B Test Managers, the "CRO & A/B Test Significance Calculator" is a specialized Chrome extension that streamlines the process of analyzing test results for statistical significance. This essential tool integrates seamlessly into your browser, empowering you to make data-driven decisions quickly and accurately.
